org.contentmine.image.pixel

Class PixelSegment

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.contentmine.image.pixel.PixelSegment

  • public class PixelSegment
extends java.lang.Object
    holds a linear segment of a path extracted from a PixelIsland. Generally created by a segmentation algorithm such as Douglas Peucker. Primarily holds an SVGLine
    Author:
    pm286
